title: Mildly Annoying Bug...
body: In the in game store all the sub-categories are listed in alphabetical order under the major categories, except for 'ability power' it should be first in its listing but instead its last, its not a game changing bug, but has cause a little confusion for me when I'm trying to buy an item in a hurry, and i have that moment of "quick, where the f*ck is it?" picture attached

replies.body:

Now I know.
